website_summaries.verdict: Whether your favorite color is raspberry, mint, coral, or something else entirely, Yummi has a set of long-burning and vibrant pillar candles to match your style.
pros: Available in 4 pillar sizes and a rainbow of bold colors
Largest pillar candle burns for 100 hours
cons: Yummi candles may drip, but it’s minimally messy

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Candles & Confirmed Dripless & Smokeless
customer_reviews.text: Used these candles in 3 glass hurricane candle holders during a wedding & following reception. The candles burned perfectly for the occasion & were beautiful. They did not drip, did not smoke & burned evenly. I had experienced using regular candles during a wedding (big mistake) which dripped on church carpet & consequently I had to iron & wipe wax out of the carpet. A real time consuming pain. These candles did not show any signs of smoking soot & the glass hurricanes shined the whole event. Very reliable candles. I highly recommend them & am thankful I found them.
customer_reviews.author: cherryroses

customer_reviews.title: Burn well but color is only on outside
customer_reviews.text: These candles were packaged exceptionally well, and they burn nicely. However, the colored wax is only a thin coating on the outside; the inside is white. That looks a little tacky after the initial first burning then I think .
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A.

customer_reviews.title: Sickening smell-even after “airing” them out
customer_reviews.text: Yuck! Had to return them because of their horrible chemical smell. I’ve never encountered a indented candel that smells like toxic waste. What do the make them with???
customer_reviews.author: decemberistsFAN

customer_reviews.title: Not What You Think
customer_reviews.text: These candles are garbage. The candle is a solid white candle dipped in the color that you choose. I thought it was going to be a solid navy blue candle. Started to burn it and it was melting away the outside and can see it is an all white candle. Not what I wanted and it's not stated in the description. Buyer beware if you are looking for solid color candles.
customer_reviews.author: Candis

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Order
customer_reviews.text: The minute I took them out of the package, color started peeling off. Thought they were same color all the way through but are white inside. Ordered brown so look awful where you can see white places peeled off. Guess you get what you pay for but even at $18 for 3 plus shipping, $27 is still a lot for junk
customer_reviews.author: chinc in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Long Burn from a Great Candle
customer_reviews.text: These candles are exactly as promised. They burn a long time in my opinion exceeding the 80 hours promised. They are fairly large and come in a box of three. They are great for atmosphere and produce a strong flame. There is not scent for these candles and they do tend produce a bit of black smoke from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Punk

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, excellent quality, good price!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of these candles. I had previously ordered 2 other colors but was not yet happy with any of them. This color was perfect because it matched my wall art plus my mustard colored throw pillows that I had also ordered from amazon. Great quality, durable!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: great color & high quality
customer_reviews.text: The teal color is very rich and meshes really well with the black candle holders I have. I haven't burned them as I got them for decor rather than to actually burn so I can't speak to that. Eventually I may burn them but for now they are sitting there looking pretty. They seem very high quality so a good value and the size was as described. Perfect for me. In picture they are kind of in the distance on the mantel. Sorry no close up.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Colored pillar candles are the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: These sand toned Yummi candles were perfect for our clients back yard ceremony. They paired perfectly with the feel and vibe of the decor. By choosing a candle that was colored verses the normal white candles really pulled the whole look together.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Dean

customer_reviews.title: Actual colors more vibrant than shown in description photos.
customer_reviews.text: Love these candles for decor only. Color is more vibrant than item descriptions show. First I ordered “coral” and they were actually more neon orange. So I returned coral and bought “peach” pictured here. Photo #2 is screen shot of Amazon pic to see difference. Candles are darker more vibrant than Amazon photos show.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gault

customer_reviews.title: They have a beautiful shape (the top is not flat)
customer_reviews.text: I've bought candles from Yummi before. They have a beautiful shape (the top is not flat), they burn well, there are great colors, and the price is great. They're my go-to for candles.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: What you see...?
customer_reviews.text: The color is consistent, if lacking in quality. Also, the candle is not cut properly and will not stand straight in the holder. It is grossly overpriced, but I got frustrated trying to combine quality with value on the Amazon website.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, burn clean.
customer_reviews.text: One of these arrived cracked. The box was rather badly damaged and repackaged. We were able to melt it back together. These candles burned nice and clean though. I love that they were not sooty and did not have that cheap candle sulfury smell. Be aware though that the beautiful color on them is only on the outside, they are pure white candles dipped in the colored wax. So if you are looking for a solid colored candle that is that color all the way through to the wick, these are not. Will buy them again but send back if we get a damaged batch instead of trying to repair.
customer_reviews.author: CB Deaux

customer_reviews.title: Caution : this is *NOT* lilac scented
customer_reviews.text: It's a great candle. But I searched for, "Lilac scented candle" and this is what I bought. I should have read the description more clearly. It is not a scented candle. Nor does the description claim it to be. But the title "suggests" it is scented. Again, as a candle it's fine. But unscented. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: MeteorPETE Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking candles!
customer_reviews.text: These pillars are perfect for my hurricane globes. Nice white. They did smoke at first though but that seemed to dissipate after a few minutes. Delivery was quick. Would have preferred option of two pieces instead of three.
customer_reviews.author: Rere

customer_reviews.title: Color only on the Outside
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing that the color of the candle is only on the outside. When it burns, it's white. So if you buy white candles it won't make any difference. But I didn't feel like I was buying cheap candles so I was disappointed that the color didn't go throughout the candle. They also drip. A lot. They come boxed in a set of 3 and they've rubbed together in the box so the outside of the candle is not flawless. That's being a bit picky, perhaps. But I do thank Yummi for making me a more aware buyer of candles from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright Yellow Round Pillar Candles
customer_reviews.text: These candles are long lasting, smokeless and beautiful on my dining table
customer_reviews.author: ArleneV

customer_reviews.title: Made cheaply
customer_reviews.text: Because the yellow is only a coating, the candles looks cheap as they burn down. Seller says they were made this way to improve the quality of the candle. No, just a cheaper way to make the candle, and it shows.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Hayes

customer_reviews.title: UNSCENTED YUMMI CANDLES! No Peach SCENT!
customer_reviews.text: Warning: The Yummi Candle is NOT Scented Peach! It is colored as Peach, but NOT SCENTED AS PEACH. So the Yummi business needs to put up a Disclaimer that their Candles are not Scented, or they can manufacture Newer Candles that look just as nice as the Candle is with Scents! Otherwise, the Candle is Safe to use, and is very appealing. If customers are looking for SCENTED Candles these are NOT the products! Unscented Candles are Yummi Candles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: We love them. They are big, solid, beautiful, and give lots of light. They don't seem to be burning too fast...we keep them lighted for an hour or two a day. Having real candles like this vs our other artificial lives adds a lot to our holiday decor.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Color changed- big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Looked great and perfect color when they were brand new. Within a month they turned a dark navy/purplish color and I had never even lit them. They were in tall glass candleholders on my outdoor enclosed labia and we not exposed to direct sunlight. Very disappointed. They were expensive
customer_reviews.author: janet donegan

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Expected solid red candles but these actually appear to be painted red on the outside only. I would return but these have been lit so cannot return. Pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Nice candle
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a burgundy candle and it’s really more cranberry colored and the color is only on outside of candle. The candle size is good and it burns clean, just wanted a dark burgundy color.
customer_reviews.author: TEL in Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: High quality candle
customer_reviews.text: Very nice candle with true colors with fair prices. They burn true and smell great and look great. They are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene A. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: color only on the outside
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these pillar candles to replace some old ones I was using for Christmas. The color Ruby Red is great for Christmas and matched other decorations I have. The down side is that the candles are actually white under the red dipped coating. There is no indication that the red color was not though out the candles. I am using them anyway but am very disappointed that the color does not go though the whole candle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great candles
customer_reviews.text: These candles are inexpensive, but made of quality materials. Very consistent. They burn well, and are odorless, yet beautiful. I’ve been using them for prayer and meditation for awhile now. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Terrence Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Do the job
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillar candles. Burn even and work out well for the deck. Happy with my purchase and i would absolutely order again if needed!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: It's a candle
customer_reviews.text: I paint candles for Baptisms, weddings and the like. I thought these were great and had a beautiful smooth finish for my artwork. However, the thin layer of wax over the candle chipped off easily and was a mess. As just a candle to burn I'm sure it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Not a great as everyone says in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: The color of these is pleasing but overall these candles are not my favorite. The color is only on the outside of the candle. It smokes quite a bit once the candle has burned down a few inches. I won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Lorange

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy candle
customer_reviews.text: color on outside, white on inside...which i good because i have had black candles that were solid black that bled black wax all over the place. Nice steady burn. The candles burn with a perfect flame. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always perfect
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate to purchase Yummi candles. They're my go to when I need a certain size or color candle. Always packed nicely, so they arrive without any blemishes in the wax. Color is always bright and true to the photo representation.
customer_reviews.author: WM

customer_reviews.title: A thrifty purchase and served the purpose well.  Buy with confidence.  You'll be pleased.  I was.
customer_reviews.text: Burns cleanly and evenly. No dripping. This was a good, economical purchase. Well-made product in secure packaging. I wish a taller version of the product was also available.
customer_reviews.author: JJoyceK

customer_reviews.title: Only blue on the exterior
customer_reviews.text: I understood these blue pillar candle would be solid blue not white covered with blue wax. That makes a difference in the work I do with color and light.
customer_reviews.author: Patrece Powers

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in poor condition
customer_reviews.text: These were packaged really poorly. They were tightly packed in a box with nothing wrapped around them, so as you can imagine they were all scrapped and scuffed up. I tried my best to smooth them out, but they never looked great, more like some I’d had rolling around in a drawer for ages.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Searls

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my Halloween décor. Just the right shade of orange. Tried to upload a pic but it did not allow me do so.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Lynn Davis

customer_reviews.title: The candles and color are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an "ocean blue" color candle and the Yummy 3" x 6" Caribbean Blue Round Pillar Candles were exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: LBJ

customer_reviews.title: Very dark navy
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit darker than the picture online and I was hoping for the lighter navy blue. If you are looking for a true dark navy this is what you want!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Roecker

customer_reviews.title: Nice candles but defects
customer_reviews.text: Candles are great color but one candle has major gouges around side. Wouldn’t mind if I was planning to burn anyway, but I got these for deco purpose only
customer_reviews.author: Deluchi

customer_reviews.title: True RED
customer_reviews.text: True RED...I've purchased other red candles but they were more pink than red. So I'm glad these are as described!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well. Good size but much darker than I anticipated. Overall, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We use these as part of our centerpieces. We burned them a little bit before to just add some rustic look to it. We love the color and the way it burned, we just wish they were scented
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy candles created a wax nightmare!!
customer_reviews.text: Are usually love yummy candles and I’m willing to pay extra for them because of the their quality. However these were really a disappointment. The ring is at the bottom are drippings from the candles they were a candle nightmare!!
customer_reviews.author: Profdam

customer_reviews.title: These candles are horrible. They are all scuffed up and look horrible
customer_reviews.text: These candles are horrible. They are all scuffed up and look horrible! I spent 50.00 bucks on these crappy things.😡
customer_reviews.author: WOW

customer_reviews.title: disappointed with these candles because they are burgundy in color ...
customer_reviews.text: disappointed with these candles because they are burgundy in color on the outside. When melting, the wax inside is white. As a result, they don't look great in my bathroom. now i have to use up two boxes of these.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lok

customer_reviews.title: Candles Were Full of Scratches
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed in the condition of the candles when they arrived. The inner seal of the box had been broken and the candles themselves looked like they were beaten up pretty bad. They had flaws and scratches in the middle and bottom sections of each candle. I immediately sent them back so I did not have the opportunity to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Yosemite Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Perfect candles, well made and true to color. I will definitely but again 😊, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Teri Lynne Miller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Candles
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Burns very well. I have them on gold plated trays but this is unnecessary as no wax even runs down the side. Love these, will order again. Also burns for longer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good green for St. Patrick's Day!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pillar candles for the small candle garden I have on my coffee table. I had trouble finding the right color green for St. Patrick's Day but these are perfect. They are the right size and add an adorable holiday accent.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: A little light for coral. Maybe more like watermelon in color. However, I was using on mantel to pull out a color in wall hanging that is also more like watermelon/coral. Perfect match and look just great. Very happy with them. Have had many compliments on how they highlight wall hanging accent color.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Eriksen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candles
customer_reviews.text: Candles were well packaged. A bit over priced. They look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Navy blue color!!
customer_reviews.text: Received my navy blue 6" pillar candles today & they are just beautiful! The color is exquisite. I look forward to using them & will be re-ordering when the time comes!
customer_reviews.author: Gbee

customer_reviews.title: 😒
customer_reviews.text: I received harvest gold instead of yellow.. Plus when opened the candles were chipped all over them .. Sent them back cause it wasn't rite
customer_reviews.author: fatchance9

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Packaged perfectly so there were no broken candles
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Packaged perfectly so there were no broken candles. I needed them for a last minute addition to the wedding decor. I was praying that they would arrive perfect........and they were!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila D.

customer_reviews.title: Best Candles!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend the white ones, they are very elegant and produce lots of light compared to other candles that i’ve used. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: fox arielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice clean burning candles
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean burning candles, they aren’t solid red all the way through, but it’s a great price and value
customer_reviews.author: Chef Chocolatier

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful candles. I was worried because of some of the reviews that I had read but mine arrived bubble wrapped and and absolutely perfect. I was very pleased and will use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl M Kostick

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color for my room. Not too strong not too light.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa kay ross

customer_reviews.title: Soft, beautiful grey!
customer_reviews.text: These candles arrived on time, and are just what I wanted. They are the exact shade of grey as pictured. They sit on my dining table and I love them. You can tell by looking that they are high quality, and I would not hesitate to order from Yummi Candles again.
customer_reviews.author: SophiesMom

customer_reviews.title: Description size is wrong
customer_reviews.text: The description says 3x4. They are 2 1/2x 3! So yes I am disappointed as I was buying them specifically for the size.
customer_reviews.author: O'Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all!
customer_reviews.text: With many colors to choose from.. these candles shall be reordered as needed!
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality...packaging was excellent...I use these 4 decorative purposes only...
customer_reviews.author: Marquette S.

customer_reviews.title: Not As Described
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were described as 3 inches by 4 inches. When they arrived imagine my surprise when they were only 2 inches wide. Totally feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Wiley62

customer_reviews.title: Burgundy is perfect shade!
customer_reviews.text: I did not light these. They are purely for decoration purposes for my pillar candle holders. They are the perfect shade of burgundy!
customer_reviews.author: artist

customer_reviews.title: Two candles have very uneven bottoms so they lean and ...
customer_reviews.text: Two candles have very uneven bottoms so they lean and look very crooked on my candle sticks. It’s very noticeable. Went and bought some even, symmetrical ones from ikea for way cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Candle color is not throughout candle
customer_reviews.text: Color is perfect but these are only coated in color. If you chip the candle you will see it is white inside and any chip will ruin the look.
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Blue
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect color for my living room. I just love them. Not too bright a blue but a very nice rich blue.
customer_reviews.author: kenny haines

customer_reviews.title: Dipped not solid color
customer_reviews.text: Burns nice, but these are dipped, not solid color. White candle with a blue outer skin.
customer_reviews.author: Debra James

customer_reviews.title: Color only on the outside
customer_reviews.text: These candles only have color on the outside; they're white on the inside. And the "burgundy" color is more like a cranberry - much lighter than one would expect for burgundy. They seem to burn okay, but the white inside presents an unattractive, cheap-looking candle as it burns lower.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kain

customer_reviews.title: Qualty
customer_reviews.text: Have not used them yet. I hope they burn well. No scent is important so they can be use anywhere, anytime without annoying guests.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Navy blue are hard to find & I LOVE these!
customer_reviews.author: J.E. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to my search.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful candles & I look forward to ordering again!! Fine service & a quality product,
customer_reviews.author: Shirley E. Skov

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: The candles are lovely, a true burgundy. The package arrived on time, as described and in good condition. I would order again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: T. Botz

customer_reviews.title: Candle review
customer_reviews.text: I really don't care for them - kinda blah. I may send them back - definitely thought they weren't worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mar

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Very happy big enough but not to big 3" X 6" great Christmas candles
customer_reviews.author: JOHN M.

customer_reviews.title: Not Finished  Correctly
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering Yummiest Candles for a long time. This batch wasn'the first finished off right. All of them have a ridge down the entire side. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Pahrump5

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these candles in the hopes that they would burn cleanly, without dripping and melting. Unfortunately, they did drip and melt. Would not purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M

customer_reviews.title: but these are not a bad deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I collect candles, some I display and others wait to be used. I prefer scented candles, but these are not a bad deal for the price. I hope they burn clean and don't drip.
customer_reviews.author: molsby

customer_reviews.title: Candle were black not gray
customer_reviews.text: They are black! I bought 3 different sizes and they are all black. Never buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice candles, well priced
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as presented in images and narrative. Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hand

customer_reviews.title: Great candle
customer_reviews.text: The candle itself is great. I was sent the wrong color but I didn't have time to send them back. The yellow is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Concetta M. Verna

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Sending back. The box that the candles were in was damaged. One candle had chunks missing. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Ann L.

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected !
customer_reviews.text: The candles are red coating not what i expected I wanted solid red wax
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and consistent
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two color sets of these now. Colors are beautiful and vibrant. Candles burn smoothly and don't drop in my experience. Perfect, long burning strong candles! Will continue to order multiple colors and sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bacot

customer_reviews.title: Yummy coral pillar candles.
customer_reviews.text: The candles were way too dark I donated them. I needed them light color.
customer_reviews.author: Nereida

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: unscented but good value for price, THEY ARE NOT 3 INCHES WIDE BUT 2.8 INCHES WIDE
customer_reviews.author: HMS

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Bright
customer_reviews.text: These candles burn slowly and cleanly. I have used them for several hours already and they barely look like they have been burned. The colors are right on and the packaging was easy to open.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: More than pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful candles. Color was even better than shown. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Holland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillars! True color, perfect fit for my sconces. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L. Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Color and dimensions.
customer_reviews.text: I used the candle in a large lantern with other candles as well. Happy with the color. Just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: I found Yummi!
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of colors to choose from. I found the right color pillar candles and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Anita W.

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect. Did not want scented candles in the dining ...
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect. Did not want scented candles in the dining room and these fit the bill. Burned very well too.
customer_reviews.author: Helen L. Hey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size. They are unscented. Went great with glass cylinders.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These candles are not worth the money. Poor quality. They are just white candles covered with a thin layer of colored wax, which easily chips to reveal the white.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Womer

customer_reviews.title: Great candles!
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what we hope for when we ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Adele Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Colorful candles for a special ocassion
customer_reviews.text: I had looked at other places but never could find what I wanted, but again I should know better. ALWAYS LOOK IN THIS WEBSITE FOR EVERYTHING I NEED. I was very satisifed with my purchase, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Glora Taylor

customer_reviews.title: not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: They arrived flat on one side as if they had melted on that side. Not cylindrical.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Harder

customer_reviews.title: Amazing color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! It made such a nice pop in my home!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I bought 6 of these candles for an outdoor Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 of these candles for an outdoor Christmas bucket /hurricane display. They are exactly the color I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful and large. Burn even. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: billie maquet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes a good centerpiece with a candle ring of holly on a small plate.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Haute

product_meta.title: Yummi 3" x 6" Blush Round Pillar Candles - 3 per Pack
product_meta.description: Size:3"x6"| Color:BlushOur unscented 6"H Blush pillar candles are ideal when creating a beautiful candlelight arrangement for the home or wedding decor. When color is essential for weddings, our candles are available in 45 trendy candle colors hand over dipped to match and compliment your wedding centerpiece decorations, bridesmaid dresses, napkins and wedding favors. Our candles are crafted with a pure white fully refined unscented paraffin wax core and then dipped by hand in our specially formulated colored over-dip wax to ensure the cleanest burn and maximum performance. We use 100% cotton wicks in all of our candles. Burns approximately 60 hours. Our candles are designed to burn smokeless and drip less at room temperature and still air. Made in Canada.
feature_bullets: Yummi colored candles are professionally hand-dipped to your preferred choice of color. The interior of the candle remains white ensuring a clean burning and drip less candle experience that emits the perfect amount of glow and ambiance every time.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars885 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
